script:
;;-----------------------------------------
;;1月覚醒マイペ
# script "lisp"
# background "ancient_back"
# bgm "bgm036" 0
;;-----------------------------------------
;;与一
# body 400531
# pos 400531 3
# scale 400531 0.8 0
# alpha 400531 0 0
# mask 400531 off
# body 400535
# pos 400535 5
# scale 400535 0.8 0
# alpha 400535 0 0
# mask 400535 off
;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# textwindow "close"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
[FF0000]覚醒ユニット追加！[-]

# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 400531 1 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
与 一

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 400531 0 0
# alpha 400535 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 400535 2 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 4005 "yoichi_unit_0006"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 400535 1 0
# move 400535 3 0
# scale 400535 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 4005 "yoichi_unit_0010"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@与一
この空気…精神が極限まで
研ぎ澄まされていくようです…！

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 400535 0 0
# waitandnext 0.2

# fadein "black" 0.3
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

# bgm "stop"
# se "SE_0619"
# fadeout "black" 1.5
# waitandnext 1.5
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！
